subject: DREAMWEAVER CS3
body:
Turn up the lights. I don't want to go home in the dark.

Enemies are so stimulating.

Power is the by-product of understanding.

With me a change of trouble is as good as a vacation.

They are the only honest hypocrites, their life is a voluntary dream, a studied madness.

The place of justice is a hallowed place.

Knowledge and human power are synonymous.

Take no thought for tomorrow for tomorrow shall take thought for the things of itself. [Matthew 6:34]

Don't be humble, you're not that great.

All animals, except man, know that the principal business of life is to enjoy it.

Setting goals for your game is an art. The trick is in setting them at the right level neither too low nor too high.

Smile, for everyone lacks self-confidence and more than any other one thing a smile reassures them.

We don't laugh because we're happy -- we're happy because we laugh.
